creator: laurent.pequin@univ-reunion.fr
text:
It's a real problem as if you use a proxy with apache, this one rewrites all URL
twice. For example, I want Apache to rewrite all requests pointing in direction
of www.univ-reunion.fr in webapps.univ.run/lenya/univ/live : this is working
well, but in the left menu, all URL are : www.univ-reunion.fr/lenya/univ/live
So, as you can think, Apache will redirect this to :
webapps.univ.run/lenya/univ/live/lenya/univ/live

SOLUTION :
----------

This is due to a variable "root" in the
LENYA_HOME/lenya/xslt/navigation/sitetree2nav.xsl
I have changed in the "href" attribute this line :
 <!-- <xsl:value-of select="concat($root, $canonical-url)"/> -->
      <xsl:value-of select="concat($path-to-context, $canonical-url)"/>

And now, it works well. So, why this variable has been changed? Maybe is there
something I can't see.
this has been fixed by the proxy settings in the publication.xconf.
